Package net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.plain

Class PlainComponentSerializer

java.lang.Object
net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.plain.PlainComponentSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.ComponentSerializer<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component,​net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent,​String>
public class PlainComponentSerializer
extends Object
implements net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.ComponentSerializer<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component,​net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent,​String>
A plain component serializer.

Plain does not support more complex features such as, but not limited to, colours, decorations, ClickEvent, and HoverEvent.

Since:
4.0.0
